author: ghellwig
body:
- miscellaneous fixes the MP production system
- subtract APEs to retrieve CPE-only covariance matrix (d9233ca47c69555a05ffc0b880eae7f83679207c)
  - removes bias on fit procedure due to different APEs in different subdetectors
  - added also a switch to get old behaviour (59415e5d568fdfba07a62225891ec924d94029bc)
    - needed for very large misalignments
- fix invalid read in ReferenceTrajectory class (be2e790b6334aeec01146a89ef8bc2d248b504a8)
- fix bug causing rare random mille binary corruption (69b4a8903b80963ba588bc0a90eb5f1e064db181)

backport of (#14592)
title: Latest MillePede fixes 80X (backport of #14592)
